heading: Hi, I'm Elfi
subtitle: HDB-to-Condo Specialist, East Singapore
body: For 13 years, I've helped Singapore families navigate the upgrade from HDB to condo. I chose to specialize in Districts 15, 16, and 18 because depth matters more than breadth. When you know every project, every street, every price movementâ€”you spot opportunities others miss. More importantly, you protect families from mistakes that take years to recover from.
